name: Operation Clover (BlackCat03)
description: A simple survival FPS based on one of my favorite videogames, Call of Duty Zombies. Lately, I saw how poor the quality of their games were, their games were pure graphics, but no interesting gameplay. In fact, the gameplay was kind of annoying imo because they made a weird attempt to make something new but instead of making it seem fresh, it felt odd and bothersome. So here it is, the game I made on 2021 as a final school project.
